attributes.title: this app RUINED my life
attributes.review: i was simply enjoying my day and was fiddling with my phone when i decided to download this app, HUGE MISTAKE! A group of men in black suits jumped me in my backyard and dragged me to a white van. Inside the van was a horribly orange old man who wouldn’t stop threatening to delete an app called tiktok. Imagine the absolute horror i was feeling. He dropped kicked me, spat on the floor and promptly shot my grandma with an AK37 before speeding away mentioning something about sexcy time with this girl named ivanka? The trauma this app has cause has deeply wounded my mental health. Dear god TAKE IT DOWN

attributes.title: Disgusting app
attributes.review: This app is the most crusty musty dusty app I have ever downloaded in my whole entire life. Literally the first time I opened it I wanted to throw up because of the disgusting things on this app. Not to mention the fact that this app used mind control on my guinea pig and made her bite my toes. Ew. Also, my curtains kept insulting me after they used this app which is unacceptable. This app is not safe and shouldn’t be available to download. This app is destroying America and I think we might need a new president if this is not his app.

attributes.title: no❤️🤮👺👺👺
attributes.review: i am very disappointed by this app😾👎👎👎👎👎 as soon as i opened the app i heard a crunchy noise coming from my closet so i walked over only to feel something grab my ankle.. i looked under the bed only to find barron trump🙀🙀🙀and he told me “don’t open the closet door” i said “barron! go play roblox” only to open the closet door and find bunker boy eating a bag of hot cheetos and chanting the curse “Have😦you😱ever😭been😫snaked🤬by🤐a😏friend🤨then😞just🤩for🤒the🥶clout🤪they’ll🥳do😇it😊again🤯” DONT RECOMEND! #trump2020butonagravestone #worstappever #allcountriesmatter #savebarrontrump

attributes.title: RIP fam
attributes.review: I downloaded the app to know all about my lord Donald trump but when I opened the app I seen this awful awful picture of a orange painted trash bag and then my tv turned on and the girl from the ring started to crawl out screaming trump 2020 my family does not like trump so she ate them all I was sure this was the apps fault because she was screaming trump 2020 now that it’s all this apps fault that I don’t have a family anymore I strongly agree that nobody should download this app unless you want to meet the girl from the ring.

attributes.title: no.. jus no
attributes.review: The first thing I saw when opening up the app was dis guy 👨🏻‍🦰who was a orange as a carrot 🥕🥕🥕🥕 and he was holding his hand up like he was constipated. 💩 n bro, he be saying “make America great” more lik “make America 🤮” like bruh WHO R YOU. But like u do be rockin dat hair tho 👁👅👁 👨‍🎤 but then it tells u to like help Donald Duck and I’m like bro, 😤aren’t u like rich enough to buy yo own help 🥶 But then it says if you help him u can meet him in person. But bro, all Ik bout this person is that he orange and rich so like 😳 and I haven’t even signed up yet and can say all dis so lik yah🥵

attributes.title: No jus NOOOO😔✨🤡
attributes.review: Okay so when I first opened the app it sent a text message to my phone saying join our orgy and sent me multiple nudes of trumps 🍄🐟💀. It hacked my phone and all of a sudden it gave me brain damage I am now in the hospital  in the ICU. They said it was caused from ugly orangutan 🦧 Cheeto aka (trump). I am now bald and have severe trauma.😔. Trump also sent his s3x tapes to me and my family that made my whole family’s phone explode🤯. And now I am typing on my Samsung fridge. Trump 2020 in the ✨𝒶𝓈𝓈✨  god never made mistakes☺️🌸✨👀 except when he made trump🙈🤑🔪✨🧚🏻‍♂️

attributes.title: Dump Tr*mp
attributes.review: I downloaded this app and it immediately called me the n word. With the hard “r”. I felt offended so I filed a complaint but I was told that this is the most progressive app out there. The sad part is that people out there were defending the app, saying that I took the quote out of context and claiming that this app is “making America great again”. I do not recommend getting this app if you are a minority, a member of the LGBTQ+ community, or a woman or if you support minorities, the LGBTQ+ community, and women. If I could give it less than one star I would 🤮.

attributes.title: Cheeto man hacked my phone
attributes.review: So first I get into the app to see the big Cheeto man getting a spray tan in Cheeto dust and him getting his corn husk to glue to his head. Then I see a link saying get your free v-bucks so I clicked on it and saw the Cheeto man saying haha noob you just got hacked so I immediately clicked off the app and saw that my home screen was the Cheeto man and Ted Bundy making out so I had to destroy my phone and get a new one and since then me and my family are traumatized and emotionally scared for life and what I’m most angry about is that I never  claimed my free v-bucks.

attributes.title: Revolting would rather have Shane Dawson be president
attributes.review: So I open the app and immediately it recommends me to Donald Trump’s Only Fans like ewww. I gladly hit decline and it’s telling me to vote for him 2020 when I thought it was a fitness app. Every two seconds I am givin a loud, obnoxious, unskipable add about Donald Trump’s only fans or banning all non white heterosexual people from the country. The app also involves religion when I know this Cheeto man with baby hands has never opened a bible or gone to church. That is all and I’d rather have Shane Dawson or Trisha Paytus be president than this bafoon🥰

attributes.title: Very anticlimactic
attributes.review: I downloaded to be entertained and have fun- like a normal Tramp supporter!!! But to my disappointment- there was nothing. The marketing is so misleading- it doesn’t do what it claims. Which is completely outrageous! I will never download this again! It was a waste of time and space on my phone. As you can tell, I am very disappointed. Hopefully the future will turn back to normal- when people, with no app development skills, stop thinking they can create apps. Leave it to the professionals please.😤👎
